sections.title: Symptoms
content: • My build is failing with the error below:

sections.title: Cause
content: This error is caused when the ProjectSettings and Assets folders are contained within a sub-directory of the folder targeted by Unity Cloud Build in your source code repository.

sections.title: Resolution
content: You can create a new target and define the name of the SubDirectory. Cloud Build will then know to look in this SubDirectory for the project it needs to build.
